column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////What they excel at is their croissants
column2: breads and pastries.  Croissants are flaky
column3: crisp and messy on the outside
column4: tasty and tender on the inside.  Breads have a satisfying crisp
column6: crunchy crust.  Although more expensive than the mediocre stuff you get at the grocery store this is well worth it.  If you have been to Europe and tried the local bakeries you know what I mean.
